snippet: The men, who found a travel bag containing the bomb last month, serve as unarmed guards on EgyptAir flights, officials at the carrier said....
abstract: Officials at EgyptAir say Hassan Ali and Abou Bakr Radwan, men who found suitcase containing bomb on Chelsea street in September and then took off with only the bag, are unarmed in-flight security guards for airline; company officials say they do not believe either man was involved in any aspect of bomb plot.

byline.contributor: Declan Walsh contributed reporting from New York, and Adam Goldman from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The men, who found a travel bag containing the bomb last month, serve as unarmed guards on EgyptAir flights, officials at the carrier said.

headline.main: 2 Men Who Found Bomb in Chelsea Are Identified as Airline Security Guards
headline.print_headline: 2 Who Found Bomb in Bag Are Identified as Airline Security Guards
